text: Selena's song ` ` Bidi Bidi Bom Bom'' is a hit that we all know every single word to. The tune was released as part of her album Amor Prohibido on July 31, 1994, and has been on repeat at every Latinx household ever since — but did you ever stop to wonder what the lyrics of the song mean? We have the answer from Selena herself. In an interview with Don Francisco on Sábado Gigante in 1994, the late Tejana singer talked about the catchy chorus of her new song.
